entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 4:03PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Snowy And Breezy Over The Interior This Weekend... A cold front along the West Coast of Alaska will move east over the Central Interior tonight, and then continue east across the Eastern Interior on Sunday.
